tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed
quoteText: participate in the collection of very large numbers of email addresses, screen names, or other identifiers of others (without their prior consent) from the Comcast Web Services, a practice sometimes known as spidering or harvesting, or participate in the use of software (including "spyware") designed to facilitate this activity;
